How many people are affected by otopalatodigital syndrome type 1 ?,"Otopalatodigital syndrome type 1 is a rare disorder, affecting fewer than 1 in every 100,000 individuals. Its specific incidence is unknown.",GHR,otopalatodigital syndrome type 1
